lead_paragraph: Sunderland manager Sam Allardyce reckons Atletico Madrid boss Diego Simeone would be labelled boring for his defence-oriented style if the Argentine were managing a Premier League club.

headline.print_headline: Simeone Would Be Branded Boring in English Football-Allardyce
headline.main: Simeone Would Be Branded Boring in English Football-Allardyce

snippet: Sunderland manager Sam Allardyce reckons Atletico Madrid boss Diego Simeone would be labelled boring for his defence-oriented style if the Argentine were managing a Premier League club....
